shortDescription: Captain Magorian is being held in a subterranean bunker attached to a complex just ahead of us. We're going to sneak a scout lance in, rescue the captain, and bug out. If all goes according to plan, the Moderbjörn's combat drones will distract the bunker's garrison and keep it out of our hair for the duration of the operation.
longDescription: If the Moderbjörn holds up its end, we should be golden. Our lance will be in trouble if it doesn't.

contractObjectiveList.title: Retrieve Captain Gaku Magorian and Extract Safely
contractObjectiveList.description: Retrieve the VIP and Extract Safely

objectiveList.title: Recover Captain Magorian by Securing the Designated Area
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to retrieve the primary rescue target.

objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone
objectiveList.description: The objective to escape with all player units.

objectiveList.title: Ensure That the 'Mech Carrying Captain Magorian Survives
objectiveList.description: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the primary target alive. Player will fail if it is destroyed.

objectiveList.title: Recover the VIP's assistant by securing the Secondary Designated Area.
objectiveList.description: The secondary and optional objective to secure the second rescue target.

objectiveList.title: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor2
objectiveList.description: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for autocomplete of mission

objectiveList.title: Ensure Secondary Asset Recovery unit survives
objectiveList.description: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the secondary target alive. The player can fail this objective.

dialogueContent.words: Captain Magorian's safe house is just ahead of you, Commander. Defenses should be light. That said, there'll probably be some armed resistance, so be ready to brush it aside.
When the AO is clear, you'll need to rush the safe house, grab Captain Magorian…
…and then make your way back out to the LZ.
////My drones have already engaged the Baumann Group's armory, Mr. Oliveira. It is in my nature to fulfill my promises.////
Yeah, we'll see. May as well get to it, Commander. I'll be ready and waiting to fetch you when the deed is done.
That's done it, Commander. We have Captain Magorian, and we are a go for evac.
What about Baumann? Is his JumpShip still up there?
Negative, XO. He's long gone.

Then our job here is done. Dr. Murad, get the Moderbjörn its computer access—codes, files, whatever it needs. Everyone else: let's move Captain Magorian onto the Leopard. We're getting the hell out of here.
////Our mission has failed, Commander. Salvage what you can and go. I will seek out the information I need on my own.////
That's it, Commander. Just hold position there for a moment, and we'll be good to go.
We're getting a tight-beam communication from a nearby JumpShip, Commander. I'm putting it through.

{COMMANDER.LastName}. Commander of {COMPANY.CompanyName}.

That's good. Now I have a face to associate with the name. And your name has become quite familiar to me of late.
Calling to parley, Baumann? If you want to finish this without further bloodshed, we'd be willing to negotiate.

I'm no great lover of bloodshed, Mr. Oliveira. But neither am I squeamish about its necessity.

When my mercenaries are finished with you, I'll see that you're given a proper burial. A sign of respect from one businessperson to another.
[GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
[GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
[GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
[GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
NYI
